name: Lint remover roller cat Dog Hair Brush pet hair remover
longdescription: This pet lint roller works great as a dog hair remover or cat hair remover. BUT Also ideal as just a clothes or furniture lint remover. The perfect lint remover for tackling lint, fuzz, dust, crumbs and other dirt on practically all clothes, furniture, furnishings, and any household, car or office surface.

name: Portable Pet Poop Scoop for Large and Small Dogs Spring
longdescription: Slide down to lock or unlock and fold, easy to use, carry and store. The handle is more in line with the human body design, and the spring is more durable. Pooper scooper large dogs heavy duty easy to Pick up waste from all surfaces, concrete, grass, gravel, etc.
